dmca.title: Vaccine site wants inoculation against copying
dmca.body:
This is a notice of copyright infringement which I am filing with you pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act on behalf of the Northern Ohio Steering Group, the copyright owner.

1.	The copyrighted work that has been infringed upon is the text that appears on http://vaccine2006.org.

2.	The material that is infringing upon the copyrighted material described in item 1 is the text that appears on http://vaccine2006.com/ which redirects to http://vaccine2006.com/www.vaccine2006.org/index.htm.

This text is identical to the copyrighted text except for the addition, near the top of the page; of Ads by Google.

3.	I can be contacted at [private]@case.edu or at the following address and telephone number:
[private]
University Professor and
Kyocera Professor of Ceramics
Dept. of Materials Science and Engineering
10900 Euclid Ave. White 418
Cleveland, OH 44106-7204
[private]
 
4.	To the best of my knowledge, the registrant of this site is:
seo99
[private]
San Antonio, Texas 78258

The administrative and technical contact is listed as Alicia Johnson. Her contact information is listed as paipal@satx.rr.com and the following address and telephone number:

[private]
[private] San Antonio, Texas 78258 [private]

The domain servers are:

NS1.DREAMHOST.COM NS2.DREAMHOST.COM NS3.DREAMHOST.COM

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Yours sincerely,
A. H. Heuer Chair
Northern Ohio Steering Group
Member, National Academy of Engineering

cc http://www.dreamhost.com
[private], National Academy of Engineering James Hinebman, National Academy of Science
